emergencyContactScreen.title: Emergency Contact Setup
audio: This is Second Step, Emergency Contact Selection
Long Press anywhere on the screen and speak the contact name to continue adding it to Emergency Contacts
Long Press anywhere on the screen and speak next to move to next screen
message: Long Press anywhere on the screen and speak the contact name to continue adding it to Emergency Contacts
emergencyContactScreen.yes: We have successfully added your contact
emergencyContactScreen.no: We have not added the contact
emergencyContactScreen.issue: We got issue adding the contact, repeat the process please

setupCompleteScreen.title: Setup Completion
audio: Now we can start assisting you
message: Now we can start assisting you

contactViewScreen.title: Contact View
contactFound: Contact {{name}} found, do you want to add it to emergency contacts?
Long Press and Speak Proceed to confirm and Cancel to cancel

homeScreen.title: Home Screen
